dict.string: First, the list is divided into two sub-lists.
Continue to divide the sub-list to the left into halves.
When the number of elements of the sub-list is one, the division is complete.
Now, two child sub-list are combined.
While being combined, these two numbers are put in order from smallest to largest.
Continue to divide the sub-list to the right into halves.
Then, two child sub-lists are merged.
Now, two groups of multiple numbers need to be combined.
The numbers from these two groups are arranged so that they are ordered from smallest to largest after combination.
The same operation is applied onto the other sub-list.
Continue to divide the sub-lists and merge them together.
Continue to divide the sub-lists and merge them together.
Continue to divide the sub-lists and merge them together.
Continue to divide the sub-lists and merge them together.
